attributes.action: Fine Pedestrians For Obstructing/Walking on Cyclepaths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are more than enough petitions on here with pedestrians moaning about pavement cyclists. But it infuriates me how they feel cycle paths are for their use when there is a pavement there. Then when we try and LEGALLY cycle past, we get abuse. Police should have the power to fine these dangerous pedestrians.
